name: Leaning Tower of Pieces
description:
Leaning Tower of Pieces is a chess piece sandbox "game" where you can stack pieces as tall as you can. It may be challenging, but figuring out the positions that lead to taller towers feels rewarding (plus freezing the pieces in place can help).

Click on the piece tiles to spawn a piece somewhere randomly on the platform. Click and drag and release to place it!

A and D rotate pieces left and right (respectively)
W will straighten your piece upright
S will flip left to right
F can freeze (or unfreeze) the pieces so you can place otherwise impossible creations at the same time.
R will reset everything, don't accidentally press this!
